name: Laundry Lunacy
description:
All the washing machines are missing their doors, and launching out clothing before they've been washed! Use your laundry basket to get the clothes back in a washer before time runs out!

Controls:

  • Hover over the basket and press and hold Spacebar to pick it up.
  • Hold the Left Mouse Button to turn the basket to the left, and the Right Mouse Button to turn it to the right.
